com.epoch.courseware

Class Institution

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epoch.courseware.Institution

  • public class Institution
extends Object
    A user's institution.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int graceDays
      Number of days students at this institution are exempt from paying to use ACE.

      Institution ID number.
      private String name
      Institution name.
      private String primaryLanguage
      Primary language of instruction.
      private String studentNumLabel
      Institution's name for student ID numbers.
